wiwaha yojana kihipayak idiripath wunath kisiwakata hitha dunne naha’ pasukalinawa mage amma nam mage wiwahaya hithin iwath kara gaththa’ mama uparimayenma aadare kala’ mage siyalu kapa kirim karala nadayin yaluwan demawupiyan pawa atha harala ayata asimithawa aadare kala’ ayata jiwithayak denna ayawa wiwaha kara gaththa ‘ mage wiwahaya asarthaka wemin aya ma samaga randu weddi mahe ahinsaka thaththa eewa dakala eyin asanipa wuna’ ohuta hardayabhadayak pawa waladuna’ eehema jiwithaya awul kara gaththa mama ada hamba wena kellek gana kohomada wiswasa karanne’
